string-array.name: language_entries
string-array.item: Burmese မြန်မာစာ

resources.string: You haven\'t set a passphrase yet!
You need to have entered your passphrase before managing keys...
Are you sure you would like to immediately trim all conversation threads to the %s most recent messages?
This will disable push messages by unregistering you from the server. You will need to re-register your phone number to use push messages again in the future.
Touch to change your default SMS app
Touch to make TextSecure your default SMS app
Warning, this will disable storage encryption for all messages and keys. Your encrypted sessions will continue to function, but anyone with physical access to your device will be able to access them.
You are not registered with the push service...
Are you sure that you want to end this secure session?
Are you sure that you want to permanently delete this conversation?
Are you sure you want to leave this group?
Recipient is not a valid SMS or email address!
Sorry, the selected audio exceeds message size restrictions.
Sorry, the selected video exceeds message size restrictions.
Sorry, there was an error setting your attachment.
This device does not appear to support dial actions.
Are you sure that you want to permanently delete this message?
Error, received stale key exchange message.
Error while saving attachment to SD card!
Received and processed key exchange message.
Received key exchange message, click to process.
Received a plaintext SMS while you have a secure session open. If they don\'t have a session open, messages you send will appear as garbled text. Click to terminate secure session.

This media has been stored in an encrypted database. Unfortunately, to view it with an external content viewer currently requires the data to be temporarily decrypted and written to disk. Are you sure that you would like to do this?
This media has been stored in an encrypted database. The version you save to the SD card will no longer be encrypted. Would you like to continue?
Unable to write to SD Card!
Are you sure you wish to delete ALL selected conversation threads?
Error, unable to write to SD card!
Error while writing to SD card.
Exporting encrypted keys, settings, and messages...
This will export your encrypted keys, settings, and messages to the SD card.
Warning, this will export the plaintext contents of your TextSecure messages to the SD card.
You have selected a contact that doesn\'t support TextSecure groups, so this group will be MMS.
One of the members of your group has a number that can\'t be read correctly. Please fix or remove that contact and try again.
An unexpected error happened that has made group creation fail.
You need at least one person in your group!
File I/O error, couldn\'t create a temporary image file.
You\'re not the owner of this group, so you cannot edit the title or picture.
You\'re not registered for using the data channel, so TextSecure groups are disabled.
Restoring an encrypted backup will completely replace your existing keys, preferences, and messages. You will lose any information that\'s in your current TextSecure install but not in the backup.
This will import messages from a plaintext backup. If you\'ve previously imported this backup, importing again will result in duplicated messages.
This will import messages from the system\'s default SMS database to TextSecure. If you\'ve previously imported the system\'s SMS database, importing again will result in duplicated messages.
Touch to open, or touch the lock to close.
You\'ve already sent a session initiation request to this recipient, are you sure you\'d like to send another? This will invalidate the first request.
Tap and configure MMS settings to continue download.
Error reading wireless provider MMS settings...
No connectivity available for MMS download, try again later...
MMS message encrypted for non-existing session...
Currently unable to send your MMS message.
You can modify these values from the TextSecure settings menu at any time.
You must specify an MMSC URL for your carrier.
Sorry, Quick Response is not yet supported by TextSecure!

The signature on this key exchange is different than what you\'ve previously received from this contact. This could either mean that someone is trying to intercept your communication, or that this contact simply re-installed TextSecure and now has a new identity key.
The signature on this key exchange is trusted, but you have the \'automatically complete key exchanges\' setting disabled.
You may wish to verify this contact.

Sorry, this device is not supported for data messaging. Devices running versions of Android older than 4.0 must have a registered Google Account. Devices running Android 4.0 or newer do not require a Google Account, but must have the Play Store app installed.
The number you specified (%s) is invalid.

We will now verify that the following number is associated with this device:

%s

 Is this number correct, or would you like to edit it before continuing?
You must specify your country code
You must specify your phone number
The server encountered an error. Please try again.
The verification code you submitted is incorrect. Please try again.
This number is already registered on a different TextSecure server (CyanogenMod?). You must unregistering there before registering here.
Unable to connect. Please check your network connection and try again.
You must enter the code you received first...
You\'ve already recently requested a voice call. You can request another in 20 minutes.
You\'ve submitted an incorrect verification code too many times. Please wait a minute before trying again.
TextSecure registration has encountered a problem.
You are not registered with the push service...
Received key exchange message for invalid protocol version.
Received message with unknown identity key. Click to process and display.
Received updated but unknown identity information. Tap to validate identity.
Currently unable to send your SMS message. It will be sent once service becomes available.
Their key is correct. It is also necessary to verify your key with them as well.
WARNING, the scanned key DOES NOT match! Please check the fingerprint text carefully.
You do not have an identity key.
You don\'t have an identity key!
Their key is correct. It is also necessary to get your fingerprint scanned as well.
WARNING, the scanned key DOES NOT match! Please check the fingerprint text carefully.
WARNING, the scanned key DOES NOT match!
You do not have an identity key.

Caution! By regenerating your identity key, your current identity key will be permanently lost, and your existing contacts will receive warnings when establishing new secure sessions with you. Are you sure you would like to continue?
You have received a message from someone who supports TextSecure encrypted sessions. Would you like to initiate a secure session?
Please choose a passphrase if you would like to locally encrypt your data.
The default system database will not be modified or altered in any way.
This could take a moment. Please be patient, we\'ll notify you when the import is complete.
Would you like to import your existing text messages into TextSecure\'s encrypted database?
Export a plaintext backup compatible with \'SMSBackup And Restore\' to the SD card.
Export an encrypted backup to the SD card.
Import a plaintext backup file. Compatible with \'SMSBackup And Restore.\'
Import the database from the default system messenger app.
Restore a previously exported encrypted TextSecure backup.
This log will be posted publicly online for TextSecure contributors to view. Feel free to examine or edit the logs below before hitting submit.
Could not grab logs from your device. You can still use ADB to get debug logs instead.
Please copy this URL and add it to your issue (long press to put in clipboard):\n\n%1$s
Manual MMS settings are required for your phone.
TextSecure is currently your default SMS app. Please set another default SMS app first to change this preference.
Automatically complete key exchanges for new sessions or for existing sessions with the same identity key
Automatically delete older messages once a conversation thread exceeds a specified length
Choose your contact entry from the contacts list.
Disable local encryption of messages and keys
Disable screen security to allow screen shots
Display message notifications in status bar
Forget passphrase from memory after some interval
Make TextSecure the default SMS/MMS application for your system.
Override system MMS settings with the information below.
Play notification sound when viewing an active conversation.
Pressing the enter key will send text messages
Replace the smiley key with an enter key
Request a delivery report for each SMS message you send
Scan through all conversation threads and enforce conversation length limits
Send and receive SMS messages when push is not available
The amount of time to wait before forgetting passphrase from memory
Use TextSecure for viewing and storing all incoming multimedia messages
Use TextSecure for viewing and storing all incoming text messages
Increase privacy and avoid SMS fees by using the data channel for communication with other TextSecure users

TextSecure requires MMS settings to deliver media and group messages through your wireless carrier. Your device does not make this information available, which is occasionally true for locked devices and other restrictive configurations.

To send media and group messages, click \'OK\' and complete the requested settings. The MMS settings for your carrier can generally be located by searching for \'your carrier APN\'. You will only need to do this once.
Registration will transmit some contact information to the server temporarily.
TextSecure can use instant messages to increase privacy and avoid SMS charges when communicating with other TextSecure users. To enable this feature, please verify your country code and phone number.
YOUR COUNTRY CODE AND PHONE NUMBER
Please check to make sure you entered your number correctly, and that it is formatted correctly for your region.

Some third party text messaging clients, such as Handcent or GoSMS, behave poorly and intercept all incoming SMS messages. Check to see if you received a text message that starts with \'Your TextSecure verification code:\', in which case you\'ll need to configure your third party text messaging app to let text messages through.
TextSecure will not work with Google Voice numbers.
If you are connected via wifi, it\'s possible that there is a firewall blocking access to the TextSecure server. Try another network or mobile data.
TextSecure can also call you to verify your number. Tap \'Call Me\' and enter the six digit code that you hear below.
TextSecure timed out while waiting for a verification SMS message.
TextSecure was unable to connect to the push service.
TextSecure will now automatically verify your number with a confirmation SMS message.
This could take a moment. Please be patient, we\'ll notify you when verification is complete.
Your device needs network connectivity in order to use this TextSecure feature. Check to ensure that it is connected to 3G or Wifi.
You don\'t currently have any identity keys in your trust database.
